txt.en: Speak with Mizâdi in Khûd Zagin on the hilltop outside of Dun Shûma.
'Let us press into Dun Shûma. For glorious victory!'
Speak with Mizâdi outside of Bârshud's fortress, Dun Shûma when you are ready to go.
Journey to Khûd Zagin and meet with Mizâdi outside of Bârshud's fortress, Dun Shûma.
Journey to Khûd Zagin and meet with Mizâdi outside of Dun Shûma
'Bârshud is close, I can feel it. It is time we drove him out of Shagâna for good.\n\n'Come on, [placeholder]! For Shagâna, and for Hamât!'
'The crucial hour has arrived, friend! Meet us outside of Dun Shûma, [placeholder]. There we will end Bârshud's reign of terror, and drive him out of Shagâna for good.'
Mizâdi has tracked Bârshud to the fortress of Dun Shûma in Khûd Zagin. The time has come to meet Bârshud in pitched battle and defeat him for good.
Speak with Mizâdi in Khûd Zagin on the hilltop
Speak with Mizâdi when you are ready to go
'This is a good spot to rest a moment. We will gather here and then press on into the fortress proper.'
